attributes.action: Disclosure and transparency  of ALL EU accounts
attributes.background: This disclosure is important before voting in the EU referendum on 23rd June 2016

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament does not have the power to disclose all EU accounts. This is a decision for the EU. You could start a petition calling on the Government to raise this with the EU.
